title: ICE: `failed to resolve instance for ..` `-Zprint-mono-items=eager`

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: requires-nightly
labels.description: This issue requires a nightly compiler in some way.

labels.name: I-monomorphization
labels.description: Issue: An error at monomorphization time

body:
### Code `rustc file.rs -Zprint-mono-items=eager` ```Rust #![crate_type = "lib"] trait Visit { fn visit() {} } trait Array<'a> { type Element: 'a; } impl Visit for () where (): for<'a> Array<'a, Element=()>, {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.70.0-nightly (7b4f48927 2023-03-12) binary: rustc commit-hash: 7b4f48927dce585f747a58083b45ab62b9d73a53 commit-date: 2023-03-12 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.70.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.7 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/instance.rs:397:18: failed to resolve instance for <() as Visit>::visit thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/7b4f48927dce585f747a58083b45ab62b9d73a53/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7ff93cd6651a -
